Recognition Notes: Bad tents; aligning tents next to slice breaks squareshape.
Best Alg Notes: Keep top tent on left with edge next to slice, send gem from bottom to form scottie/shell.
Parents: Left Scottie / Shell; Gem / Left Axe

Recognition Notes: Good tents; aligning tents next to slice preserves squareshape.
Good tent/whale; splitting tent on top and sandwiched tent on bottom preserves squareshape.
Best Alg Notes: Split tent on top and sandwiched tent on bottom, holding both tents in front.

Recognition Notes: Bad tent/whale; splitting tent on top and sandwiched tent on bottom breaks squareshape.
Best Alg Notes: Swap tent on top (so that it's not touching the slice) with same-colored spill on bottom (keeping shell on DL) to form spill/axe.
Parents: Left Spill / Left Axe; Right Bird / Left Scottie

Best Alg Notes: Swap tent on top (so that it's not touching the slice) with same-colored spill on bottom (keeping shell on DL) to form spill/axe.

Recognition Notes: Good tent/whale; splitting tent on top and sandwiched tent on bottom preserves squareshape.
Best Alg Notes: Split tent on top and sandwiched tent on bottom, holding both tents in front.

Recognition Notes: Good whale/tent; splitting sandwiched tent on top and tent on bottom preserves squareshape.
Best Alg Notes: Split sandwiched tent on top and tent on bottom, holding both tents in front.

Recognition Notes: Bad whale/tent; splitting sandwiched tent on top and tent on bottom breaks squareshape.
Best Alg Notes: Keep only isolated corner on top, swapping isolated edge for same-color whale to form scottie/bird.
Parents: Left Scottie / Right Bird; Left Axe / Left Spill

Recognition Notes: Bad whales; whales are mirrors of each other.
Best Alg Notes: Swap top whale head, held against slice with tail in UL, with full bottom whale in DR.
Parents: Left Axe / Gem; Gem / Right Axe; Right Scottie / Shell; Left Scottie / Shell

Recognition Notes: Good whales; whales are the same as each other.
Best Alg Notes: Swap both whales to form good tents.
Parents: Right Tent / Right Tent; Right Thumb / Right Thumb
